statements: SELECT * FROM AB_Testing_Results;
SELECT experiment_name, conversion_rate FROM AB_Testing_Results WHERE conversion_rate > 0.5;
SELECT experiment_name, start_date, end_date FROM AB_Testing_Results ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT experiment_name, test_group, conversion_rate FROM AB_Testing_Results WHERE test_group = 'Control';
SELECT experiment_name, traffic FROM AB_Testing_Results WHERE traffic = 'ENGAGED_USERS' ORDER BY conversion_rate DESC;
SELECT * FROM AB_Testing_Results WHERE experiment_id = '12345678-1234-5678-1234-567812345678'
SELECT experiment_name, conversion_rate FROM AB_Testing_Results WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30'
SELECT experiment_id, experiment_name, end_date FROM AB_Testing_Results WHERE test_group = 'Control' ORDER BY end_date DESC
SELECT test_group, AVG(conversion_rate) AS avg_conversion_rate FROM AB_Testing_Results GROUP BY test_group HAVING avg_conversion_rate > 0.5
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_experiments, SUM(traffic) AS total_engaged_users FROM AB_Testing_Results WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date <= '2022-12-31'
SELECT * FROM ab_test_results;
SELECT test_name, test_start_date, conversion_rate FROM ab_test_results WHERE test_end_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT test_name, test_description FROM ab_test_results ORDER BY test_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM marketing_strategies WHERE strategy_end_date > '2022-06-30';
SELECT strategy_name, strategy_description, conversion_impact FROM marketing_strategies ORDER BY strategy_start_date;
SELECT * FROM ab_test_results ORDER BY test_name DESC, conversion_rate ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT test_name, test_start_date, test_end_date FROM marketing_strategies WHERE strategy_start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT test_id, test_name, test_description, conversion_rate FROM ab_test_results WHERE conversion_rate > 0.5 ORDER BY conversion_rate DESC;
SELECT strategy_name, COUNT(strategy_id) AS total_strategies FROM marketing_strategies GROUP BY strategy_name HAVING COUNT(strategy_id) > 1;

SELECT test_name, test_start_date, test_end_date, conversion_rate FROM ab_test_results LEFT JOIN marketing_strategies ON ab_test_results.test_id = marketing_strategies.strategy_id WHERE test_end_date > '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM ab_test_results;
SELECT test_name, test_group FROM ab_test_results WHERE conversion_rate > 0.5;
SELECT user_id, user_name FROM user_data ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT test_id, date, clicks, revenue FROM test_performance WHERE date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT test_name, test_group, conversion_rate FROM ab_test_results WHERE test_group = 'Control' ORDER BY conversion_rate DESC;
SELECT test_name, test_group, conversion_rate FROM ab_test_results;
SELECT user_name, email, age, gender FROM user_data ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT test_id, SUM(clicks) AS total_clicks, SUM(conversions) AS total_conversions, SUM(revenue) AS total_revenue FROM test_performance GROUP BY test_id;
SELECT test_id, date, clicks, conversions FROM test_performance WHERE revenue > 1000;
SELECT test_id, test_name, test_group, conversion_rate FROM ab_test_results WHERE conversion_rate > 0.05 AND test_group = 'control';
SELECT * FROM ab_test_results;
SELECT test_name, test_group, conversion_rate FROM ab_test_results ORDER BY conversion_rate DESC;
SELECT user_name, email, age, location FROM user_data WHERE age > 30;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM ad_campaigns WHERE budget > 1000 ORDER BY start_date;
SELECT user_id, campaign_id, conversion_type, revenue FROM conversion_metrics WHERE conversion_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM user_data WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY user_name ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT user_name, email, location FROM user_data WHERE location='New York' AND age BETWEEN 25 AND 40;
SELECT test_id, test_name, conversion_rate FROM ab_test_results WHERE significant=true ORDER BY test_id DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date, budget FROM ad_campaigns WHERE start_date < '2022-01-01' AND end_date > '2022-06-30';
SELECT conversion_id, user_id, revenue FROM conversion_metrics WHERE conversion_type='purchase' AND revenue > 100 ORDER BY revenue DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM ab_test_results;
SELECT test_name, test_variation, conversion_rate FROM ab_test_results;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, budget FROM marketing_campaigns;
SELECT segment_name, segment_description FROM user_segments;
SELECT user_id, action_type, action_date FROM user_actions;
SELECT * FROM ab_test_results WHERE conversion_rate > 0.5;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE budget > 10000;
SELECT test_name, test_variation, conversion_rate FROM ab_test_results WHERE test_id = 3;
SELECT segment_name, segment_description FROM user_segments WHERE segment_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT * FROM campaign_results WHERE result_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
